articles.title: Fireball sighting over Indiana confirmed by American Meteor Society - IndyStar
articles.description: Over 100 eyewitnesses reported seeing the fireball to the American Meteor Society. It likely lasted between three and five seconds.
articles.content:
It's a bird! It's a plane!
It's actually not, and it's not Superman. It's a fireball.
